page.title: 03DISABLED PEOPLE IN ENHAM
page.content: Since 1918 there have been disabled people in Enham Alamein.The hostel where they live was built for people injured in the World Wars, it is now used as a place of work and lodgings for disabled people all with different disablities.We went to see Mrs.Ballard who has had Polio since she was 18 months.She now lives with her husband in a newly built bungalow,her husband is disabled too.She finds she can cope but with things to help her{HOME LIFE Her husband works in the Industries which produces {ARTS AND CRAFTS}and other things. The disabled people's { HEALTH}is taken care of by the local surgery. Their {HOUSING} is most adequate, but changes have been made, for example Mrs.Ballard's plug sockets have been moved to a position that is easier to reach as she is in a wheelchair.They keep a dog for company
